mapper.update: ALTER TABLE `form_attribute` CHANGE `handler` `handler` enum('formselect','forminput','formtextarea','formradio','formcheckbox','formdate','formtime','formeditor','formdivider','formstaticList','formcascadeList','formdynamicList','formuserselect') COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL COMMENT '属性处理器' after `type`
